question: What was the role of Eithné, known as the Silver-Eyed, in relation to humans and the forest Brokilon?
answer: Eithné, also known as the Silver-Eyed, was the queen of the dryads and ruler of Brokilon. She forbade the entry of humans into the forest due to her absolute hatred for them. Her stance towards humans involved granting them no exceptions, responding with an arrow to the head regardless of their pleas or threats. Under her leadership, only in rare circumstances were humans allowed within Brokilon's boundaries.
